item.description: Come and join me in watching the Oscars this year.  Bring a snack or drink to share.  I will try to come up with some Oscar-related games to play too.  Or I have tons of board games that have been popular to play at my past Oscar parties if you guys are feeling up to it. Hope to see you there!  My number is 503-784-2792 if you have any questions or need help finding my place.  There is a lot of parking available on the street during the weekends too.
item.why: I am a huge movie nut and always enjoy watching the Oscars but it is even more fun to watch it with lots of cool people.
item.name: Oscar Party
